title: 【Student Dormitory】– Illustration Meetings of the Student Dormitory Committee Election for Academic Year 2024-2025
author: 鍾佩玲
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 學務處 - 鍾佩玲 - free22011@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-3890-6217
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Student Dormitory】– Illustration Meetings of the Student Dormitory Committee Election for Academic Year 2024-2025
日期： Fri, 1 Mar 2024 08:58:01 +0800

Dear Students,
    It’s time again for the annual election for the dormitory committee. In order for the student to learn about the election, we will have a meeting on 3/5(Tue) and 3/6(Wed) at the Student Dormitory Complex. Participating students will be rewarded one hour of Muti-Discplinary Learning credits.

Meeting agenda:
1. Briefing of the Student Dormitory Committee:
(1) Regulations and structure 
(2) Duties and responsibilities
(3) Election and recruiting
2. Questions, comments or opinions.

Time and Location
(1) 3/5(Tue)18:30, Dormitory 7
(2) 3/5(Tue)20:00, Dormitory 6
(3) 3/6(Wed)18:30, Dormitory 3(Male)
(4) 3/6(Wed)20:00, Dormitory 3(Female)

If you have any question, please contact: Mr. Chung at (03)890-6217

Student Living Services Division
Office of Student Affairs
